title: "Chugger, Chugger, Chugger, Phew, Phew" - My Friend Eric: Improvised Actual Play
itunes:title: "Chugger, Chugger, Chugger, Phew, Phew" - My Friend Eric: Improvised Actual Play
description:
What if space M&S took on space Sainsbury's and space Tesco? We answer hard hitting and important questions like these in this week's episode! For those of you who don't know, My Friend Eric is a segment where we prove that you don't need to spend hours planning to have a blast playing DnD with your friends.   

Want more 3BH in your life?
You can now buy merchandise here! 

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes including kickbacks where we hang out with some of our favourite people and previous guests of the show and discuss... well anything we feel like! 

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @3blackhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
What if space M&S took on space Sainsbury's and space Tesco? We answer hard hitting and important questions like these in this week's episode! For those of you who don't know, My Friend Eric is a segment where we prove that you don't need to spend hours planning to have a blast playing DnD with your friends.
